about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Who I am
about.text1: I am a FullStack developer with a focus on front-end, specialized in creating modern, responsive web interfaces centered on user experience. In the back-end, I have experience with Java and Node.js, developing robust solutions integrated with REST APIs and PostgreSQL databases. With knowledge in technologies like ReactJS, JavaScript and Bootstrap, I transform creative ideas into functional and high-performance applications.
about.text2: My journey in web development started over 3 years ago, and since then I have worked on challenging projects that allowed me to improve my technical and creative skills.
